declarations.comments: Free monadic language for making flows.
declarations.title: Flow

declarations.comments:
Runs UI and doesn't return anything useful (equivalent to `void <<< runUI`).
Handles error in runtime.
declarations.title: showUI

declarations.comments: Serializes a value and puts it into the state.
declarations.title: set

declarations.comments: Serializes a value and puts it into the local storage.
declarations.title: save

declarations.comments:
Runs UI and returns result of user's interaction with a screen.
Handles error in runtime.
declarations.title: runUI

declarations.comments: Executes a set of actions and returns when the first one is done
declarations.title: oneOf

declarations.comments: Gets some data from local storage and deserializes to `s` if possible.
declarations.title: load

declarations.comments: Forks a flow and returns a void control structure.
declarations.title: launch

declarations.comments: Gets some data from state and deserializes to `s` if possible.
declarations.title: get

declarations.comments:
Runs UI async, doesn't return anything useful.
Handles error in runtime.
declarations.title: forkUI

declarations.comments: Forks a flow and returns a control structure for getting results back (like Future).
declarations.title: fork

declarations.comments:
Runs UI with a custom converter
Handles error in runtime.
declarations.title: evalUI

declarations.comments: Runs any Aff as part of the flow
declarations.title: doAff

declarations.comments: Delays computation for the given amount of time.
declarations.title: delay

declarations.comments: Call API being authorized.
declarations.title: callAPI

declarations.comments: Awaits a forked flow to be completed.
declarations.title: await'

declarations.comments: Awaits result from a forked flow.
declarations.title: await

declarations.comments: Free monadic Interaction type. Denotes a request-response interaction.
declarations.title: Interaction

declarations.comments: Represents a relation between types `a` (input type) and `b` (output type).
declarations.title: Interact

declarations.comments: Algebra of the Flow free language.
declarations.title: FlowMethodF

declarations.comments: Free monadic language for making flows.
declarations.title: Flow

declarations.comments: FlowWrapper for existential type.
declarations.title: wrap

declarations.comments: Gets some string from state by key
declarations.title: getS

declarations.comments: Puts a string value into state using key.
declarations.title: setS

declarations.comments: Gets some string from localStorage by key
declarations.title: loadS

declarations.comments: Puts a string value into the localStorage using key.
declarations.title: saveS

declarations.comments: Converts error to string and throws at runtime or returns result.
declarations.title: withError

declarations.comments: Supresses error.
declarations.title: suppress

declarations.comments: Throws error.
declarations.title: throwErr

declarations.comments: Runs UI and returns result of user's interaction with a screen.
declarations.title: runUI'

declarations.comments:
Runs UI and returns result of user's interaction with a screen.
Handles error in runtime.
declarations.title: runUI

declarations.comments:
Runs UI async, doesn't return anything useful.
Handles error in runtime.
declarations.title: forkUI

declarations.comments:
Runs UI and doesn't return anything useful (equivalent to `void <<< runUI`).
Handles error in runtime.

declarations.title: get

declarations.comments: Forks a flow and returns a control structure for getting results back (like Future).
declarations.title: fork

declarations.comments: Forks a flow and returns a void control structure.
declarations.title: launch

declarations.comments: Runs any Aff as part of the flow
declarations.title: doAff

declarations.comments: Awaits result from a forked flow.
declarations.title: await

declarations.title: await'

declarations.title: delay

declarations.title: oneOf

declarations.comments: Gets some data from local storage and deserializes to `s` if possible.
declarations.title: load

declarations.title: save

declarations.comments: Checks if permissions granted.
declarations.title: checkPermissions

declarations.comments: Tries to aquire permissions.
declarations.title: takePermissions
